definitions: something that enables a difference or distinction to be made

examples.text: the real differentiator between the two is the size

shortDefinitions: something that enables difference to be made

definitions: an organ or substance that induces or controls differentiation

examples.text: in mammals, the Y chromosome is the principal sex differentiator

definitions: a device or circuit that outputs an electrical signal proportional to the rate of change of the input signal

examples.text: an optical feedback loop with a differentiator is required

shortDefinitions: device that outputs electrical signal proportional to rate of change of input signal
